attributes.action: Reduce fuel prices with immediate effect by cutting fuel duty by 30%
attributes.additional_details: Fuel prices are spiralling out of control and everyday workers, households, businesses are finding it impossible to meet the costs. Fuel companies are making obscene profits off the back of these record prices and a cap on profits could help fund the lost revenue the government will lose by reducing duty.
attributes.background: Reduce fuel prices with immediate effect by cutting fuel duty by 30% for 12 months to ease the burden on everyday householders

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure if you want the Government to reduce fuel duty, cap profits on fuel, both, or do something else.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Remove duty on motor fuel completely: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613908

Cap profit fuel forecourt operators can make on petrol and diesel to 10p/litre: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616956
